message: For three solid days I've been puzzled by the async/await pattern. Thanks in part to your blog, I had an epiphany tonight and I' "getting it". Thanks so much for taking the time to make your thoughts public. I've read many of the writings from Eric L, et. al., but when they leave out the pieces about how "async" marked methods auto-magically create a Task for you (and why) the whole thing is very confusing.
